 Graduate programs 
 The department offers graduate programs leading to a PhD degree and an MSc in Chemistry, both of which include the possibility of specializing in biochemistry as well as chemistry. 
 PhD in Chemistry 
 The Department of Chemistry & Biochemistry offers a PhD in chemistry (with research options in biochemistry). 
 Read more 
 Course registration 
 MSc in Chemistry 
 The Department of Chemistry & Biochemistry offers an MSc in chemistry (with research options in biochemistry). 
 Read more
